name: Anakin's Lightsaber
Lore: 'Constructed by Anakin Skywalker. Kept by Obi-Wan Kenobi until given to Luke.',
Text: 'Deploy on your Skywalker of ability > 3. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.',
